thread.title: Florida Senate rejects ban on assault weapons

title: Florida Senate rejects ban on assault weapons
text:
Florida Senate rejects ban on assault weapons 7:04am EST - 01:12 
Florida state senators rejected a proposal to ban assault weapons, and voted for a measure to arm some teachers, weeks after 17 people were killed in the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Florida state senators rejected a proposal to ban assault weapons, and voted for a measure to arm some teachers, weeks after 17 people were killed in the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history.
